The banquet of musick, or, A collection of the newest and best songs sung at court, and at publick theatres with a thorow-bass for the theorbo-lute, bass-viol, harpsichord, or organ / composed by several of the best masters ; the words by the ingenius wits of this age. Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
6 v. of music
Printed by E. Jones for Henry Playford ..., In the Savoy : 1688-1692.
Illustrated t.p. Compiled by Henry Playford. Cf. DNB. "Licensed, Nov. 19, 1687. Rob. Midgley" Reproduction of original in Folger Library. Imperfect: vols. 2-6 lacking in filmed copy.
=======
The banquet of musick, or, A collection of the newest and best songs sung at court, and at publick theatres with a thorow-bass for the theorbo-lute, bass-viol, harpsichord, or organ / composed by several of the best masters ; the words by the ingenius wits of this age. Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
6 v. of music
Printed by E. Jones for Henry Playford ..., In the Savoy : 1688-1692.
Illustrated t.p. Compiled by Henry Playford. Cf. DNB. "Licensed, Nov. 19, 1687. Rob. Midgley" Reproduction of original in Folger Library. Imperfect: vols. 2-6 lacking in filmed copy.
